about_the_game:
A 41-page artbook featuring the game's art in high quality, a bit about the psychology behind the characters, developer commentary, and more.

it contains spoilers, so only read it after you've finished all the endings!

MyGF will always be free and you do not require this DLC to play the game.

By purchasing this artbook you will be helping me continue to create more games and fund my future creative endeavors.

A NOTE

MyGF is a mysterious story and I like leaving the secrets to your imagination. I love reading how you guys interpret the mysteries and characters differently, and I don't want to ruin that by giving any external 'word of god' explanations - much less put that knowledge in an optional artbook. If I ever were to confirm any theories, it would be in a proper game.

Please utilize the little details I've put into this book to help strenghten your theories and change your perspectives on the characters and the story. This is supplemental content that I hope will make your next playthrough or discussion about the game even richer.

HOW TO ACCESS ARTBOOK

The artbook is downloaded on MyGF's installation folder, inside the 'MyGF Digital Extras' folder.

Right click the game, then Manage > Browse local files.

The file is a .pdf that can be viewed with any app that opens .pdfs. As the artbook is in extremely high resolution, you might need to zoom out a little to read it properly while on PC.

USING THE ARTBOOK

You can print out the artbook yourself for personal use, to put it in your room, show your friends, etc. But please do not sell it, physically or digital - I already have a tough time making any money at all from my creations, and it would be really upsetting. I'm a solo dev with zero investors or anyone backing me up financially.

Thank you...

I only made this book due to how much you guys love MyGF. Thank you for loving it even when I can't, and for continuing to buy the Another Episode DLC. The DLC's sales are my only recurring source of income at the moment and it really means so much to me.

Thanks to you, I was able to achieve things that I never though would be possible. I'm cooking up a lot of amazing stories, so please look forward to them!
